about_the_game:
Mine, Trade, and Prosper!

Take control of your mining freighter and delve into asteroid clusters to uncover valuable ores, rare metals, and alien artifacts. Master the balance of risk and reward as you trade your findings to upgrade your fleet and expand your horizons.

Mine Your Way to Riches!

Take command of your spacecraft and journey into the unknown reaches of space. Dig into asteroids to uncover precious gems and rare metals, promising great riches.

Survive the Wild Edges of Space!

Navigate treacherous asteroid belts, evade lurking alien predators, and fend off opportunistic pirates. With limited fuel and supplies, every decision matters in this lawless frontier.

Upgrade Your Fleet!

Customize your mining freighter and scout ships with powerful upgrades and specialized equipment. From reinforced hulls to advanced scanners and weapons, tailor your vessels to suit your strategy and survive the harshness of space.

Explore Diverse Cosmic landscapes!

Embark on adventures across varied celestial environments, each with its own challenges and wonders. From icy expanses to volatile volcanic realms, the universe awaits your discovery.

Forge Bonds with Unique Characters!

Meet a colorful cast of characters—fellow explorers, opportunists, and enigmatic travelers. Their stories intertwine with your journey, shaping the narrative as you build trust, alliances, or rivalries.

Defy the Abyss, Discover the Beyond!

The frontier is unforgiving, but it rewards the bold. Will you risk it all to push beyond the brink? The riches, mysteries, and dangers of the cosmos await.

Wishlist Now!

name: Beyond The Brink

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400); AMD FX-4300 (4 * 3800)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti (1024 VRAM); Radeon HD 7750 (1024 VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2048 VRAM); Radeon R9 380 (2048 VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Beyond The Brink is a top-down spaceship adventure game where you mine, trade, and survive on the fringes of colonized space. Upgrade your ship, explore asteroid fields, face pirates and aliens, and uncover treasures in the dangerous, uncharted reaches of space.
